topic.title: Running old software (Diablo) on a new Mac? (Intel)
topic.body:
Hi! Recently I've got the itch to dive back into Diablo and I was thinking about plaything through all 3 in chronological order. I've discovered that old software no longer works on Mac due to the switch over to Intel. I've done a little research but as of yet I haven't found a decent solution. SheepShaver is an option but from what I've read it isn't made to emulate old games and won't work very well.

Anyone out there know how to emulate older Mac games?

Thanks!

topic.title: Just stumbled on a working FPS zite built in Unity
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19Nj3Wwknp5vQXzP657gUANDCQRdTczeAz/

I'm not sure if the unity game its self is distributed or just the page, but if it is distributed over zero that's pretty impressive. Happy to seed this one. Just randomly stumbled upon it while looking for new zites to seed.

topic.title: Looking up phone numbers?
topic.body: I've been getting a lot of odd calls lately and I was wanting to look some of the numbers up. Anyone here have a good way to reverse search phone numbers? I know about the Facebook thing, but that isn't useful here as the calls I'm getting are marketing shit.

1524462057_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body:
I feel bad for people who believe they're victims of gang stalking. :-\

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PLqMpnc54j8

1524828207_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: What about Australia? Can we do them?

1524843622_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: Half dose of how many mg?

1524885164_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: Keep going, I don't mind. At worse it'll give me a chance to test out the mute user feature.

> [spez](#comment_2_14SdmjaKbQKJxpMYwh8jJFtbXsM2nBmrBc): what happened in regards to what? i've seen your posts, just calm down and talk a bit, im no therapist but seriously we can talk if you need

plz don't edit my posts. :<

1524884486_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: you better respect his musk or he'll hit you with that flamethrowa

1524903149_173pXRMqj6vLLVMV92FuyxAJWmcD5.body: I'm here because of Deep Web Browsing on YouTube. Shouts out to Mutahar!!

1524150545_1ErQYVi5mdM9hGb6uT4jg8iwGxcJB.body: I see a fair few of your links are from the "New Century Foundation". Lead by a self-described white separatist. But hey, at least he isn't an anti-Semite as well. That's good, I guess.

> [moonman1488](#comment_3_122Epj7hmiJjKTdB6NJzeLt3N5T424KwsR): p

You're right that what I said wasn't an argument. I didn't address any article specifically. But I believe it's important to know the biases of those conducting/funding a study, especially with statistics which can be so easily manipulated. So long as his methodology is fine, then all is well. Knowing his biases means I've got to keep an extra eye out, just as I would reading a study funded by Greenpeace on GMOs. It doesn't automatically discredit something in its entirety, not at all, but I think it's fair to keep in mind. 

Also, no joke, I think it's interesting that Jared Taylor seems to consider Jewish people white. That's not something I would have expected.

1525166833_1KCJ86Jg3LNBpHxcaRojsHTg9Qme9.body: Since Diablo comes with both a Mac and Windows version on every disk I'm going to tryout CrossOver. Maybe that'll do the trick. I tried VirtualBox and Windows XP but it had limited functionality.
After obtaining a definitely not pirated copy of Windows XP and RTFM I got VirtualBox to work. Now all I've got to do is try that IPX wrapper and get some multiplayer mates.

1525110299_1LAitKPQa2dNhNPTt2NKT2F4DuHWV.body: When she starting droning on about 'time shifting hackers' I couldn't help but laugh my ass off. Didn't she already admit to and apologize for this shit? Fuck her, she deserves what's coming to her. If you virtue single non-stop you better have a skeleton free closet.

1525203779_1KCJ86Jg3LNBpHxcaRojsHTg9Qme9.body: It's still working good for me. Not sure what's up.

1525405825_1Jt6aamh4UWpSRG421JivqanL5SQc.body: The Zero devs have talked about it on their blog. They're attempting to circumvent recent Chinese censorship.

1525400717_13mzHpz8ZHzQJ91v9eRMB21NqKk1u.body: Would appear that this needs seeded. Not able to connect from my side.

1525792444_1KCJ86Jg3LNBpHxcaRojsHTg9Qme9.body:
@> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_257_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)

Yeah, i've just been putting the numbers into google. Nothing much comes up though, generally it's block of numbers, even with the "quotes" to drill the results down a little bit. I'll check out the app. A good caller I.D. would be perfect actually. Thanks.
